/usr/local/cuda-11.4/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/MyProject.dir/src/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/MyProject.dir/src/kernel.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/MyProject.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.4/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  /usr/local/cuda-11.4/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu" -L"/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
